data.enText: the remains of an animal or a plant which have become hard and turned into rock
fossils over two million years old

data.chText: 老人；（尤指）老顽固，思想僵化的人，老古董
data.enText: an old person, especially one who is unable to accept new ideas or adapt to changes

word_means: 老顽固，思想僵化的人，老古董

means: (尤指)老顽固，思想僵化的人，老古董

tr: the remains (or an impression) of a plant or animal that existed in a past geological age and that has been excavated from the soil
someone whose style is out of fashion

value.def: A fossil is the hard remains of a prehistoric animal or plant that are found inside a rock.

trans: 遗迹化石；痕迹化石；生痕化石

partsOfSpeech.dec: foss〔= oss〕骨 + ify 使… → 变成化石
oss 骨 + eous …的 → 骨头的
oss 骨 + ific 产生…的 → 产生骨的 → 成骨的
ossi 骨 + form 形状 → 骨形的
oss 骨 + ify …化 → 骨化
oste 骨 + itis 表炎症 → 骨炎
